english.OR ENTER HERE TO CREATE YOUR OWN: OR ENTER HERE TO CREATE YOUR OWN
english.PLEASE ENTER YOUR FIRST AND LAST NAME TO: PLEASE ENTER YOUR FIRST AND LAST NAME TO CONTINUE
INSTRUCTION: Whether it's a mask, a cape, or tights, every superhero needs their own super look. It's time to create yours!

Start by uploading or taking a photo of yourself. Using the menu on the left side of the screen select your superhero appearance and accessories to build your avatar. Or you can choose from a series of pre-selected accessory combinations from the menu on the right.
Download your avatar and share with us via the link in the email for a chance to win Abbott Excellence Awards
